Name: Cradle of Souls
About the game: SUMMARY Cradle of Souls is a 2D RPG in the classic style of Valiant - Resurrection, Skyfall and Elendia Ceus. The Cradle of Souls is where all life begins and ends, the very spiral of humankind. A long time ago, humans started making bargains with Salazar, the Soul Emperor. In exchange of their soul, the Emperor gave them unnatural powers, they became inhumans. The Soul War was waged between humans and inhumans for the control of the country of Alastria. After winning the long and bloody war, Alastria is enjoying peace, but not the King. His wife, the Queen Jolanda is sick with a dangerous disease. In charge of finding the antidote is Orlando, the veteran Crusader, and Saigo, the Demon Hunter. What will happen as consequences of this mission and it's outcome will change everything... FEATURES Classic Storyline. Reminiscent of old-school JRPG classics Classic party, with fun and intriguing interactions Sidequest to complement the gameplay experience Quest Journal to track your main quests and sidequests Mouse support to those who prefer it MORE GAMES TO PLAY / / /
